ValidationRule.description: If status rolls back, require Status Reason.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Status__c))), CASE(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), "New", 1, "Documents Pending", 2, "Documents Received", 3, "Ready to Submit", 4, "Submitted to ISO", 5, "Under Review", 6, "Approved", 7, "Declined", 7, 0) > CASE(Status__c, "New", 1, "Documents Pending", 2, "Documents Received", 3, "Ready to Submit", 4, "Submitted to ISO", 5, "Under Review", 6, "Approved", 7, "Declined", 7, 0) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Moving status backward is not allowed.
